query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Cornish.
1 Io vidi già cavalier muover campo, 2 e cominciare stormo e far lor mostra, 3 e talvolta partir per loro scampo;
query.error: **English:** 1 I saw a knight move camp, 2 and begin an attack and show their strength, 3 and sometimes retreat for their safety;

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Cornish.
4 corridor vidi per la terra vostra, 5 o Aretini, e vidi gir gualdane, 6 fedir torneamenti e correr giostra;
query.error: **English:** 4 I saw raiders in your land, 5 O Aretines, and I saw war bands go out, 6 jousting tournaments and running jousts;

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Cornish.
7 quando con trombe, e quando con campane, 8 con tamburi e con cenni di castella, 9 e con cose nostrali e con istrane;
query.error: **English:** 7 sometimes with trumpets and sometimes with bells, 8 with drums and with signals from castles, 9 and with local and foreign things;

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Cornish.
10 né già con sì diversa cennamella 11 cavalier vidi muover né pedoni, 12 né nave a segno di terra o di stella.
query.error: **English:** 10 but never with such a strange signal 11 did I see knights or foot soldiers move, 12 or a ship by land or star.
query.result: 10 mes nyns yw gans kemmys cennamella 11 me a welas milwr drehevel na pedoni, 12 na nef a synn a dir pe ster pe steren.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Cornish.
13 Noi andavam con li diece demoni. 14 Ahi fiera compagnia! ma ne la chiesa 15 coi santi, e in taverna coi ghiottoni.
query.error: **English:** 13 We went with the ten demons. 14 Ah, fierce company! but in church 15 with the saints, and in the tavern with the gluttons.
query.result: 13 Ni a vea gans an deg demon. 14 Ah, fella company! mes y'n eglos 15 gans an sens, ha y'n taverna gans an ghiottoni.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Cornish.
16 Pur a la pegola era la mia ’ntesa, 17 per veder de la bolgia ogne contegno 18 e de la gente ch’entro v’era incesa.
query.error: **English:** 16 Yet my attention was on the pitch, 17 to see every detail of the ditch 18 and of the people who were burning inside it.
query.result: 16 Mes orth y'n pegola vea va'm ens, 17 rag gweles a'n bolgia pub contegno 18 ha'n dus a dus o vea ensys incesa.

query.prompt:

query.prompt:
